bot_related.description: Displays the help menu with a summarised list of commands.
Displays names of people who have helped contribute to the making of this bot.
Displays lists of usable nicknames for all characters for character related commands (builds, weapons, cubs etc.).
Displays a list of usable nicknames for a specific character for character related commands (builds, weapons, cubs etc.).

information.description: Provides a list of builds for any character.
Displays an image with the numbering notation used to describe builds in the PGR community.
Displays Ko's infographic for how affixes work in PGR.
Displays Aether's infographic for how affix teams in PGR.
Provides a view of all the skills for a particular character with a dropdown menu.

information.command: basic, red, yellow, blue, core, signature, leader, qte, class, ss, sss, s+, leap
information.description: Displays a particular skill for a character.
Displays details for a particular weapon.
Displays details for a particular memory.
Compares the stats between 2 memories and recommends the top/bottom position for both memories.
Displays a comprehensive list of all available memories.
Displays a comprehensive list of all available characters.
Displays a comprehensive list of all available CUBs.
Displays a comprehensive list of all available weapons.
Displays a comprehensive list of all available leaps.
Calculates the Ultimate PPC score of a particular time and difficulty.

nicknames.description:
Displays a list of usable nicknames for a specific character for character related commands (builds, weapons, cubs etc.).
Ensure that the name used as the argument is the frame name. You cannot use nicknames to search for a nickname list (lmao)

build.description: Provides a list of builds for any character.

buildnotation.description: Displays an image with the numbering notation used to describe builds in the PGR community.

affixguide.description: Displays Ko's infographic for how affixes work in PGR.

affixteams.description: Displays Ko's infographic for how affixes work in PGR.

skills.description: Provides a view of all the skills for a particular character with a dropdown menu.

basic.description: Displays the Basic Attack skill for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

red.description: Displays the Red Orb skill for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

yellow.description: Displays the Yellow Orb skill for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

blue.description: Displays the Blue Orb skill for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

core.description: Displays the Core Passive for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname. As Core Passive descriptions are getting longer as the game progresses, they have been set up to be paginated rather than be presented in one big wall of text.

signature.description: Displays the Signature Move for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

leader.description: Displays the Leader passive for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

qte.description: Displays the QTE skill for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

class.description: Displays the Class passive for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

ss.description: Displays the SS and S5 rank up buffs for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

sss.description: Displays the SSS and SS3 rank up buffs for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

s+.description: Displays the SSS3, SSS6 and S+ rank up buffs for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

leap.description: Displays the Leap skills for a particular character. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname.

weapon.description: Displays details for a particular weapon. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname or weapon name. If a character name/nickname is used, all usable weapons for that particular character will be displayed in a pagination format with each button having each usable weapon of every rarity present in the game.

memory.description: Displays details for a particular memory. The given input in the square brackets should be a memory name

cub.description: Displays details for a CUB. The given input in the square brackets can be a character name/nickname or actual pet name.

minmax.description: Compares the stats between 2 memories and recommends the top/bottom position for both memories.

ppc.description: Calculates the Ultimate PPC score of a particular time and difficulty.

memorylist.description: Displays a comprehensive list of all available memories.

characterlist.description: Displays a comprehensive list of all available characters.

cublist.description: Displays a comprehensive list of all available CUBs.

weaponlist.description: Displays a comprehensive list of all available weapons.

leaplist.description: Displays a comprehensive list of all available leaps.

nicknamelist.description:
Displays a list of nicknames for each character. If a character's nickname is not on this list that you would like to see present on this bot, please reach out to Ek to discuss if the nickname is safe to use.

To use the nicknames, all you will need to do is replace the name of the character/weapon/CUB/build name with the nickname that you would like to search a particular item/skill for.
